Functions¶

Here we talk about very interresting functions !!!

ludopack.functions.myfunction(x)¶

A powerful function tha computes \(y = x^2\)

Parameters:x (float) – the x value
Return type:float 
>>> x = 5
>>> y = myfunction(x)
>>> y
25
>>> print " AMAZING !!
  File "<stdin>", line 1
    print " AMAZING !!
                     ^
SyntaxError: EOL while scanning string literal
>>> print "AMAZING !!"

Note

This function will get me the Fields medal ! (at least)
